age. gnome matur at the same rate as human, and most are expect to settl into adult life around the age of 40. they can live to 350 year on averag, but it 's not too uncommon for them to reach 500 year of age.

tinker. you have profici with artisan tool( tinker 's tool). use those tool, you can spend 1 hour and 10 gp worth of materi to construct a tini clockwork devic( ac 5, 1 hp). the devic ceas to function after 24 hour( unless you spend 1 hour repair it to keep the devic function), or when you use your action to dismantl it; at that time, you can reclaim the materi use to creat it. you can have up to three such devic activ at a time. when you creat a devic, choos one of the follow option: clockwork toy. thi toy is a clockwork anim, monster, or person, such as a frog, mous, bird, dragon, or soldier. when place on the ground, the toy move 5 feet across the ground on each of your turn in a random direct. it make nois as appropri to the creatur it repres. fire starter. the devic produc a miniatur flame, which you can use to light a candl, torch, or campfir. use the devic requir your action. music box. when open, thi music box play a singl song at a moder volum. the box stop play when it reach the song 's end or when it is close. at your dm 's discret, you may make other object with effect similar in power to these. the prestidigit cantrip is a good baselin for such effect.
